edu.ncsu.dre.impl
Class DefaultDREConfiguration

java.lang.Object
  edu.ncsu.dre.DREConfiguration
      edu.ncsu.dre.impl.DefaultDREConfiguration

public final class DefaultDREConfiguration
extends DREConfiguration

This configuration is provide to default in case no configuration is loaded by the user. An instance of this class loads the following LexicalSegregator StandAloneScheduler XMLAggregator on to the current configuration.

Author:
Santthosh Babu Selvadurai

          Constructor for the default DREConfiguration, which will be used when no runtime configuration is specified.

Constructor Detail

DefaultDREConfiguration

public DefaultDREConfiguration()
Constructor for the default DREConfiguration, which will be used when no runtime configuration is specified. Populates objects of LexicalSegregator, StandAloneScheduler and XMLAggregator onto the configuration. If you wish to override this, then you can use specify a XML configuration file and call the setConfiguration(File) in DREFramework, or extend the DREConfiguration yourself to pool in a required set of components.
